trans-unit.source: Represents the resolution supported by a printer.
trans-unit.target: Representa a resolução com suporte em uma impressora.

trans-unit.source: This class is used by the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterResolution%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties to get the printer resolutions that are available on the printer and to set the printing resolution for a page, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é usada pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PrinterResolutions%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PrinterResolution%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedades para obter as resoluções de impressora que estão disponíveis na impressora e definir a resolução da impressão de uma página, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> property to determine whether the printer resolution type is the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind> value <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Custom>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> propriedade para determinar se o tipo de resolução de impressora é o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind> valor <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Custom>.

trans-unit.source: If so, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Y%2A> properties to determine the printer resolution in the horizontal and vertical directions, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, use o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Y%2A> propriedades para determinar a resolução da impressora nas direções horizontais e verticais, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: For more information on printing, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace overview.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como imprimir, consulte o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> visão geral do namespace.

trans-unit.source: The following code example populates the `comboPrintResolution` combo box with the supported resolutions.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir preenche a `comboPrintResolution` caixa de combinação com as resoluções com suporte.

trans-unit.source: The example assumes that a <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo box exists.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo supõe que um <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument> variável chamada `printDoc` existe e se a caixa de combinação específico existe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution" />.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution> class.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir mostra os valores de propriedade inicial para uma instância do <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution> classe.

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Propriedade

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: Valor inicial

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the printer resolution.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a resolução da impressora.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind" />.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned is not a member of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído não é membro da enumeração <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind" />.

trans-unit.source: This member overrides the <see cref="M:System.Object.ToString" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Esse membro substitui o método <see cref="M:System.Object.ToString" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains information about the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.String" /> que contém informações sobre a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal printer resolution, in dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: A resolução horizontal da impressora, em pontos por polegada.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal printer resolution, in dots per inch, if <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind" /> is set to <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Custom" />; otherwise, a <see langword="dmPrintQuality" /> value.
trans-unit.target: A resolução horizontal de impressora em pontos por polegada, se <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind" /> é definido como <see cref="F:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Custom" />; caso contrário, um <see langword="dmPrintQuality" /> valor.

trans-unit.source: `dmPrintQuality` is a member of the `DEVMODE` (device mode) structure, which defines constants that map to printer quality settings.
trans-unit.target: `dmPrintQuality` é um membro do `DEVMODE` estrutura (modo de dispositivo), que define as constantes que são mapeados para as configurações de qualidade de impressora.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.X%2A> property contains the value `DMRES_HIGH` if <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.High>, `DMRES_MEDIUM` if <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Medium>, `DMRES_LOW` if <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Low>, and `DMRES_DRAFT` if <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> is set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Draft>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.X%2A> propriedade contém o valor `DMRES_HIGH` se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> é definido como <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.High>, `DMRES_MEDIUM` se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> é definido como <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Medium>, `DMRES_LOW` se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> é definido como <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Low>, e `DMRES_DRAFT` se <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> é definido como <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Draft>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `DEVMODE` structure, see the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o `DEVMODE` estrutura, consulte a biblioteca MSDN em [ http://msdn.microsoft.com/library ](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical printer resolution, in dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a resolução vertical da impressora, em pontos por polegada.

trans-unit.source: The vertical printer resolution, in dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: A resolução vertical de impressora, em pontos por polegada.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> property is not set to <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Custom>, the default value of the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Y%2A> property is -1.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Kind%2A> propriedade não está definida como <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolutionKind.Custom>, o valor padrão de <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterResolution.Y%2A> propriedade é -1.
